name: Think Bot
description:
The Game is Made For BadaSoch Game Jam !

Hi...so the Theme is BadaSoch. And you literally Have to Think big in order to complete some of the levels...you Can play in any order, by that i mean You Can play whichEver level you Want and...its 11:30 pm right...now so ...yaa thats it for the description  ! Hope you like the Game....i will probably upload the gameplay in my yt chennel "Solar Sunny" https://solar-sunny.itch.io/rewind-79-year .
